pr_title: Display full height of data tables in reports

timeline.message:
Display full height of data tables in reports

* Make aggregation config prop needsControlledHeight a function
* return false for needsControlledHeight if widget is a data table

timeline.bodyText: Do you know a better place for this collection of widgets types which do not need a controlled height?
timeline.author: linuspahl

replies.bodyText: For now it's fine, because the plugin definitions contain the required knowledge. If we want to be able to delegate it, we should switch over to having a needsControlledHeight method on the Widget class. In that case we could delegate it further to the visualizations, in case of the aggregation widget.
replies.author: dennisoelkers
